parse.title: List of Australian rules football statues

text.*:
This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

This is a list of Australian rules football-related statues.a

Contents

  • 1 Statues
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes
  • 4 References

Image Title / individual(s) commemorated Unveiled Sculptor Location Source

Commemorative Sculpture for the

Neil Roberts Unknown Linda Klarfeld Melbourne High School, Melbourne, VIC [23]
N/A Norm Smith 2012, September Lis Johnson Melbourne Cricket Ground, Melbourne, VIC [24]
Paul Kelly 2010, August Cathy Weiszmann Sydney Cricket Ground, Sydney, NSW [25]

Ron Barassi 2003, September Louis Laumen Melbourne Cricket Ground, Melbourne, VIC [27]
Russell Ebert 2015, August Unknown Adelaide Oval, Adelaide, SA [28]
Tom Wills
Commemorative Sculpture for the
First Game of Australian Rules Football 		2001 Louis Laumen Melbourne Cricket Ground, Melbourne, VIC [29]

Notes[edit]

  • ^ Note a: It does not include any busts, friezes, figurines, medallions, cameos or deathmasks.
